tool_name: Linguakit - Natural Language Processing in the cloud
tool_description: Linguakit API (formerly CilenisAPI) helps you to analyze and extract information from texts. Add language technology to your software in a few minutes using our cloud solution. We offer you technology based on years of research in Natural Language Processing in a very easy and scalable SaaS model trough a RESTful API.
title: Linguakit - Natural Language Processing in the cloud

api_list.name: Triples Extractor
api_list.description: It extracts triples relations: OBJECT1 RELATION OBJECT2

required_parameters.name: lang_input
required_parameters.description: Language in wich the text is written. Code: en - english, es - spanish, pt - portuguese and gl - galician

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: This is the text you are goint to analyze or extract information.
optional_parameters.default: Type or paste here the text you want to analyze
